HeroComponent.mainText: A chameleon             developer who             adapts to                    anything

ProjectComponent.descProject3: 400+ sites, here are some of them:

AboutComponent.Line1: Hello, I’m Mathéo Lopes, a freelance web developer based in Paris.
AboutComponent.Line1_2: partnerships with professionals in various fields,
AboutComponent.Line2: My background is rooted in development, but enriched by experiences
AboutComponent.Line2_2: like real estate, working with teams; I especially appreciate
AboutComponent.Line3: that make a difference. I’ve had the opportunity to create
AboutComponent.Line3_2: the freedom this career offers and meeting interesting people.

PhotoComponent.Maintxt: I'm always excited to discuss new projects and collaboration opportunities. Feel free to reach out and let’s work together on amazing projects.

RCI.line1: Creation of a dynamic website for an expert in energy optimization and.
RCI.line2: Installation inspections. Implementation of customized features,
RCI.line3: with a dedicated space for services to facilitate client engagement.
RCI.line4: Result: a significant increase in visibility and increased client retention
RCI.line5: thanks to a high-performance, solution-oriented platform.

Sibane.line1: Creation of a website for a diagnostician with over 20 years of experience.
Sibane.line2: We integrated a personalized quote simulator that transformed his site
Sibane.line3: into a powerful conversion tool. The result? Retention of over a dozen
Sibane.line4: additional clients, while reinforcing his image as a leader in the field.

HelloDash.line1: Implementation of a complete dashboard for our clients, a true CMS designed for
HelloDash.line2: flexibility and autonomy. Through this dashboard, they can create unlimited pages,
HelloDash.line3: customize every aspect of their site, and easily manage their content. With an
HelloDash.line4: integrated blog generator, over 50 articles have already been published by our clients,
HelloDash.line5: and a notification system keeps them informed in real-time.

ThomasLossie.line1: Creation of a website for an art director, a polished project submitted to Awwwards!
ThomasLossie.line2: Our client saw a 50% increase in online visibility, putting his work in the spotlight.
ThomasLossie.line3: This project allowed him to connect with new clients
ThomasLossie.line4: and showcase his work to a wider audience.

DiagInnov.line1: Design of a unique website for a diagnostician, with a dynamic and colorful cartoon aesthetic.
DiagInnov.line2: The site offers a captivating visual experience, ideal for standing out
DiagInnov.line3: in the real estate diagnostics sector. Thanks to this original design,
DiagInnov.line4: our client easily grabs attention and engages visitors at first glance.
